Name: Freiwillig
About the game: Join the ranks of the volunteer fire department in Tübingen, Germany, and defend the city from evil-doers through arcade puzzle action! The Firefighter Duel Rotate and drop the falling blocks to create reaction chains for big points! Fire ignites bombs, toasts marshmallows, and burns wood. Water extinguishes fire. Ice extinguishes fire and melts into water. Water, wood, and brick clear if five or more are connected. Story Mode Play as one of the brave men or women (or cats in human disguise) in the Tübingen fire department and duel your way through a deep plot that threatens the city! Infinity Mode Go for a high score on your own, but beware: the game gets faster and more difficult the longer you play!
